ing: 5 fluid ounces freshly squeezed orange juice
des: "If you can make a screwdriver, then you're one small step away from a Wallbanger. Just float a little GallianoÂ® (an herbal Italian liqueur) over the top and you're there."
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour in vodka and orange juice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Pour a floater of Galliano(R) over the top. Serve with a slice of orange.
